entry.title: Brock Pierce?
entry.summary: The commenter expresses their opinion that EOS is not a viable solution for censorship resistance. They go on to state their belief that anything supported by Brock, whom they refer to as a "pedo," is bound to fail. It is unclear what specific actions or statements by Brock led the commenter to make this claim. Nonetheless, they seem to believe that his involvement with any project is a red flag.
